name: Hong Phung Phat
title: Senior Software Developer
summary:
As a Senior Web Developer with over 10 years of experience, I specialize in creating modern and efficient web applications. My expertise includes working with Angular and React to build user-friendly interfaces that solve real business problems. Throughout my career, I have successfully delivered projects for various industries, from social networks to data management systems. I take pride in writing clean, maintainable code and staying up-to-date with the latest web technologies.

In my current role, I focus on designing scalable applications and helping junior developers grow their skills. I am particularly interested in improving application performance and creating better user experiences. I am now seeking opportunities where I can use my technical skills and leadership experience to make a significant impact on challenging projects.
shortSummary: Senior Web Developer with 10+ years of experience in Angular and React. Strong focus on clean code, performance optimization, and mentoring. Currently seeking opportunities to lead challenging projects and drive technical innovation.
